title: Coronavirus: Nigeria's mega churches adjust to empty auditoriums
description: With worshippers banned from congregating, pastors are adapting to coronavirus restrictions.
content:
Image copyrightGetty ImagesImage caption
 Pentecostal churches, which have a huge following in Nigeria, have been closed
The auditoriums of Nigeria's mega churches are empty and their gates are shut as they are forced to observe a government ban on large ga… [+5638 chars]
